films.title: Aliens (Extended Cut)
films.description: James Cameron took Ridley Scott's sci-fi horror and transformed it into a large-scale, gonzo war movie, with all guns blazing.
films.cast: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Paul Reiser, Lance Henrikson

films.title: Avatar 3D
films.description: James Cameron pushed the boundaries of cinematic technology with this visionary sci-fi, which became a box-office behemoth.
films.cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

films.title: Avatar: The Way of Water 3D
films.description: James Cameron's world-building sci-fi epic goes aquatic as Jake, Neytiri and their family seek a home on Pandora and to evade an off-world threat.
films.cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Kate Winslet

films.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
films.description: James Cameron transforms the world of his low-budget original into a technologically groundbreaking sci-fi action thriller that combines stunning set-pieces with breakneck pacing.
films.cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick

films.title: The Terminator
films.description: James Cameron's breakthrough debut is a classic sci-fi and the perfect vehicle for Arnold Schwarzenegger. A new 35mm print made with funding from the National Lottery
films.cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

films.title: The Worlds of James Cameron
films.description: The perfect primer to a season of films by one of Hollywood's most successful, innovative and visionary filmmakers.

films.title: Titanic
films.description: James Cameron takes the fateful journey of the grand liner and transforms it into a swooning, sweeping cinematic event.
films.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Cathy Bates

films.title: True Lies
films.description: Arnie flexes his comic chops, while Jamie Lee Curtis almost steals the show as his frustrated wife in James Cameron's grand-scale espionage action-comedy.
films.cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Art Malik
